claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ron Cobb  (  born 1937  )  is an American cartoonist , artist , writer , film designer , and film director .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: By the age of 18 , with no formal training in graphic illustration , Cobb was working as an animation `` inbetweener '' artist for Disney Studios in Burbank , California .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He progressed to becoming a breakdown artist on the animation feature Sleeping Beauty  (  1959  )  .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: (  This was the last Disney film to have cels inked by hand .  )

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After Sleeping Beauty was completed in 1957 , Disney laid off Cobb and he spent the next three years in various jobs -- mail carrier , assembler in a door factory , sign painter 's assistant -- until he was drafted in 1960 into the US Army .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: For the next two years he delivered classified documents around San Francisco , then , after signing up for an extra year to avoid assignment to the infantry , was sent to Vietnam in 1963 as a draughtsman for the Signal Corps .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On his discharge , Cobb began freelancing as an artist .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He began to contribute to the Los Angeles Free Press in 1965 .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Edited and published by Art Kunkin , the Los Angeles Free Press was one of the first of the underground newspapers of the 1960s , noted for its radical politics .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Cobb 's editorial/political cartoons were a celebrated feature of the Freep , and appeared regularly throughout member newspapers of the Underground Press Syndicate .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: However , although he was regarded as one of the finest political cartoonists of the mid-1960s to early 1970s , Cobb made very little money from the cartoons and was always looking for work elsewhere.His cartoons were featured in the back to the land magazine `` The Mother Earth News . ''

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Among other projects , Cobb designed the cover for Jefferson Airplane 's 1967 album , After Bathing at Baxter 's .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He also contributed design work for the cult film , Dark Star  (  1973  )   (  he drew the original design for the exterior of the Dark Star spaceship on a Pancake House napkin  )  .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His cartoons from the 1960s and 1970s are collected in RCD-25  (  1967  )  and Mah Fellow Americans  (  1968  )   (  both Sawyer Press  )  , and Raw Sewage  (  1971  )  and My Fellow Americans  (  1971  )   (  both Price Stern and Sloan  )  .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: None of these volumes remains in print .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1969 Cobb designed the Ecology symbol , later incorporated into the Ecology Flag .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1972 , Cobb moved to Sydney , Australia , where his work appeared in alternative magazines such as The Digger .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Independent publishers Wild & Woolley published a `` best of '' collection of the earlier cartoon books , The Cobb Book in 1975 .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A follow-up volume , Cobb Again , appeared in 1978 .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1981 , Colorvision , a large-format , full-colour monograph appeared , including much of his design work for the films Star Wars  (  1977  )  , Alien  (  1979  )  , and Conan the Barbarian  (  1982  )  , the first feature for which he received the credit of Production Designer .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Cobb has also contributed production design to the films The Last Starfighter  (  1984  )  , Leviathan  (  1989  )  , Total Recall  (  1990  )  , True Lies  (  1994  )  , The Sixth Day  (  2000  )  , Cats & Dogs  (  2001  )  , Southland Tales  (  2006  )  , and the Australian feature Garbo , which he directed .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Cobb contributed the initial story for Night Skies , an earlier , darker version of E.T. .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.

premise_source_doc_sentence: His designs can be seen most notably in Loadstar : The Legend of Tully Bodine  (  1994  )  and The Space Bar  (  1997  )  , in which he designed all the characters .

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.

claim: Ron Cobb has only ever been a painter.
